name: Teeth Fixed
description:
Ever wondered while waiting in a dentist’s office what it would be like to be one yourself? Now is your chance to be on the other side of the chair! Experience being a dentist as you clean, shine and decorate your patients’ teeth. Enjoy the role play!
Features:
*Many patients to treat
*Clear food particles
*Clean tartar
*Fill cavities
*Spray water in the mouth and drain it with special tools
*Extract decayed teeth
*Brush teeth
*Color teeth and decorate them with fancy accessories
*Earn coins and stars as you play the game

As these apps are free, they may contain third party advertisements.
